page.title: 02VILLAGE AMENITIES
page.content: The villlage centre,conveniently has a bakers,butchers,hardware and wool shop.The Co-op Supermarket,which also incorporates the Post Office,sells foodstuffs quite cheaply.Children shop at Mrs.Dunn's store,because she waits patiently while they choose favourite sweets.The Pioneer Stores,sells food and is also a newsagents.There is a hairdresser and fish and chip shop!! The only omissions are a chemist and bank.The shops are well patronised but many families journey to nearby towns for large weekly or monthly purchases where prices are more competitive. Boars Tye and Western Garage provide petrol and car repairs.The half hourly bus service goes to Braintree and Witham.There is a surgery and baby clinic and a community policeman lives in the village.The Hotel and The Western Arms are the local pubs.
